forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then mainly cloudy late with light rain possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
